body_html: So... where it says to run pacman in Cmd.exe - it means to run the pacman command in Cmd.exe, not powershell (like I did above). Running in powershell you never see a prompt to "continue(Y/N)" you do see it in Cmd.exe
body_text: So... where it says to run pacman in Cmd.exe - it means to run the pacman command in Cmd.exe, not powershell (like I did above).  Running in powershell you never see a prompt to "continue(Y/N)" you do see it in Cmd.exe
body: So... where it says to run pacman in Cmd.exe - it means to run the pacman command in Cmd.exe, not powershell (like I did above).  Running in powershell you never see a prompt to "continue(Y/N)" you do see it in Cmd.exe
